overview: In Bootcamp 2, you will firm, tone and sculpt your muscles for a perfect body, while getting  the cardio workout that will keep you at the top of your game. Billy leads you through an intense and motivating core combination of military drills and fast footwork for the ultimate fitness experience! Get the results you are looking for in a pound-blasting, body-shaping experience.
title: Billy's Bootcamp 2: Tae Bo
